mapper.insert: insert into store_info (store_id, owner_id, store_name, store_desc, store_lat, store_lon) values(#{storeId}, #{ownerId}, #{storeName}, #{storeDesc}, #{storeLat}, #{storeLon})
insert into menu_info (store_id, menu_name, menu_price, unit) values(#{storeId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{unit})
mapper.select: select store_id, owner_id, store_name, store_desc, store_lat, store_lon from store_info where owner_id = #{ownerId}
select store_id, menu_name, menu_price, unit from menu_info where store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: insert into menu_info (store_id, menu_name, menu_price, unit) values(#{store_id}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{unit})
